A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was almost perfect. The only isues I had were there were a few too many jokes at serious moments and the cgi wasn't as good as in the force awakens. \nThe plot was really well paced and fast like a lot of Star Wars movies. It really keeps you hooked the whole movie it doesn't feel like you're sitting there for two and a half hours.  Some use of the camera movement was a  different from other Star Wars movies but not really bad there was a lot of use of the quick closing in movemt in this movie which was again not bad but could be used a few times less. I personally felt like I could notice a lot more cgi in this film compared to tfa and rogue one but there was a good use of practical effects which is always a great thing. Overall this movie was one of the best if not the best Star Wars movie ever especially plot wise.
